page.title: 01GAZETTEER: SUMMING UP;WESTON
page.content: WHEN IT WAS DECIDED TO UNITE ASTON AND WESTON ECCLESIASTICALLY THE CONSEQUENCES FOR THE SCHOOL COULD NOT HAVE BEEN FORESEEN. THE LARGER PARISH,ASTON,HOUSES THE RECTOR (WHO IS CHAIRMAN OF THE GOVERNORS AT WESTON SCHOOL) AND HIS FAMILY AND IN RECENT YEARS MASSIVE HOUSING DEVELOPMENTS IN ASTON HAVE CREATED AN IMBALANCE IN POPULATION.NO MORE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT IS ENVISAGED IN WESTON.CHELLASTON TOO HAS MUSHROOMED,BEING THE VILLAGE/SUBURB WHERE THE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL IS SITUATED.DERBY IS ENCROACHING ON GREEN FIELDS AT ALVASTON; PARENTS MOBILITY AND PARENTAL CHOICE ENCOURAGES (RIGHTLY!)MOVEMENT BETWEEN SCHOOLS REQUIRING AN EXAMINATION OF CURRICULAE FALLING ROLLS HAS HEIGHTENED COMPETITION BETWEEN SCHOOLS, AFFECTING HOUSE PRICES.WILL WESTON SCH.SURVIVE?
